evidence.source_document: Emergency Motion for a Stay Pending Appeal
evidence.text: (1)  This motion was not filed earlier because the District Court’s final temporary restraining order was issued one day ago, on April 22, 2025.

extracted.value: United States Department of Justice filed an Emergency Motion for a Stay Pending Appeal on April 22, 2025, requesting the court to grant a stay pending appeal of the district court’s temporary restraining order.

evidence.text: Emergency MOTION for Temporary Restraining Order by Petitioners D.B.U., R.M.M.. (Entered: 04/12/2025)

extracted.value: Petitioners D.B.U. and R.M.M. filed an Emergency Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order on April 12, 2025, seeking a TRO to prevent removal of noncitizens from the District of Colorado.
Petitioners D.B.U. and R.M.M. filed a Motion for Class Certification on April 12, 2025, seeking to certify a class of noncitizens subject to the Alien Enemies Act proclamation.

evidence.text: MOTION for Leave to Proceed Under Pseudonym by Petitioners D.B.U., R.M.M.. (Entered: 04/12/2025)

extracted.value: Petitioners D.B.U. and R.M.M. filed a Motion for Leave to Proceed Under Pseudonym on April 12, 2025, requesting permission to proceed using pseudonyms.

evidence.text: MOTION to Certify Class by Petitioners D.B.U., R.M.M.. (Entered: 04/12/2025)

extracted.value: Petitioners D.B.U. and R.M.M. filed a Motion to Certify Class on April 12, 2025, seeking to certify a class of noncitizens.

evidence.text: 13 | 2025-04-14 | Emergency MOTION to Clarify by Petitioners D.B.U., R.M.M.. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A, # 2 Exhibit B)(Macdonald, Timothy) (Entered: 04/14/2025)

extracted.value: Petitioners D.B.U. and R.M.M. filed an Emergency Motion to Clarify on April 14, 2025, requesting clarification of a prior ruling.
